info.title: Capacity Building for Protocol Compliance API
info.description: API for retrieving key areas of capacity building necessary to implement and comply with biodiversity protocol obligations.

get.description: Returns terms representing key areas for building capacity to implement and comply with protocol obligations.

200.description: A list of capacity building terms related to protocol compliance

example.name: Key area 1: Capacity to implement and to comply with the obligation of the Protocol

title.en: Key area 1: Capacity to implement and to comply with the obligation of the Protocol
title.es: Esfera clave 1: Capacidad para aplicar las obligaciones dimanantes del Protocolo y para cumplir con ellas
title.fr: Domaine clé 1 : La capacité d’appliquer le présent Protocole et de satisfaire aux obligations qui en résultent.
title.ar: المجال الرئيسي 1: القدرة على تنفيذ الالتزامات المنصوص عليها في البروتوكول والامتثال لها
title.ru: Ключевая область 1. Потенциал для осуществления и соблюдения обязательств в рамках Протокола
title.zh: 主要领域 1：执行《议定书》和履行《议定书》义务的能力
